overview: G. Ward Paxton is co-founder of the Company and serves as Chairman of the Board for Intrusion Inc. Ward has served as President, Chief Executive Officer and a director since the Companyâ€™s inception in September 1983 and served as Chief Financial Officer from 1983 until 1994. Prior to founding the Company, Ward was Vice President of Honeywell Optoelectronics, a division of Honeywell, Inc., from 1978 to 1983. From 1969 to 1978, Ward was Chairman of the Board, President, Chief Executive Officer and founder of Spectronics, Inc., which was acquired by Honeywell, Inc. in 1978. Prior to founding Spectronics, Inc., he held various managerial and technical positions at Texas Instruments Incorporated from 1959 to 1969. Ward holds Ph.D., M.S. and B.S. degrees in Physics from the University of Oklahoma.
